resources.string: The modulo operator returns the remainder of a division operation. For example, 14\u00a0/\u00a03\u00a0=\u00a04.67, while 14\u00a0%\u00a03\u00a0=\u00a02. This is because 3 divides into 14, 4 times, with 2 left over. Remember, we don\u2019t need to pay attention to the quotient of the division, only the remainder.
Enter an IP address or Network ID
